entry.def: If you make headway, you progress towards achieving something.

example.ex: He is not disappointed at the failure to make headway towards resolving their differences...
example.tran: 他们之间的分歧依然未能解决，他对此并不感到沮丧。

example.ex: There was concern in the city that police were making little headway in the investigation.
example.tran: 警方在调查中未能取得什么进展，对此市民有些担心。

means.word_mean: 1. vertical space available to allow easy passage under something
